mapper.update: update game_record set user_confirm_flag_bits = case when #{uid} = win_uid1 then 8|user_confirm_flag_bits when #{uid} = win_uid2 then 4|user_confirm_flag_bits when #{uid} = lose_uid1 then 2|user_confirm_flag_bits when #{uid} = lose_uid2 then 1|user_confirm_flag_bits else user_confirm_flag_bits end where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from game_record where (#{uid} = win_uid1 and (8&user_confirm_flag_bits) != 8) or (#{uid} = win_uid2 and (4&user_confirm_flag_bits) != 4) or (#{uid} = lose_uid1 and (2&user_confirm_flag_bits) != 2) or (#{uid} = lose_uid2 and (1&user_confirm_flag_bits) != 1) order by id desc
